manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sleep well / Sweet dreams! Our bedding is just for giving you a comfortable and healthy deep sleep.Pillows allows you with your family ,friends, enjoy the happy moments, Get a good night’s rest with the HOOMQING Alternative Breathable Bed Pillows.
Sleep Like a Baby A suitable pillow can adjust your sleep posture and improve your sleep quality. After a busy day of work and study, you will be able to relax and enjoy life.

Premium Filled Fiber The ultra-soft texture maximizes comfort while you sleep. Light and soft feeling brings you a different sleeping experience from your family. Machine Washable on Gentle Cycle Wash on a delicate cycle using cold water1.Dry by laying flat on a well-ventilated area Great for everyone This pillow offers softness, comfort and support for all one, The entire family can enjoy for a better night’s rest.Especially suitable for the elderly and children, Suitable for spring/summer/autumn/winter use.It touches the skin and doesn't even need a pillowcase

Adjust the Correct Sleeping Posture The Pillow provides proper neck alignment and support, It give you the comfort you need for a long-lasting, good night sleep. Pillows are supportive enough to keeping the body aligned for back, stomach and side sleepers.

WHY CHOOSE OUR PILLOWS? Filling is full and High-elastic, fluffy, Firm, soft and comfortable.Protect the spine when sleep, No more neck pains.Our bed pillows are 100% Polyester Microfiber filled.Sweat absorbing and breathable.Great support, not easy to be deformed.Skin-friendly cover to keep you comfortable and cool as you sleep.Balanced softness with support.The pillow will be fully fluffed after 48-72 hours. You also can pat it for a quick fluff.Exquisite design gives the pillows a luxurious look.Without any odormaking you feel like sleeping on a cloud.TIPS:It's Packaged in a Vacuum Bag, Please spread It for a Few Days Before Use So It Would Return to Normal Thickness.Best Way Fluffy Again: Lay It in the Sun for a Few Hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these pillows
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are nice and soft, and perfect for me. My dog (bless him) ate my last two pillows when he was in puppy phase so these were to replace them. My ONLY gripe is that they were both stuffed in a bag that after trying desperately to inch them out I had to break down and cut the bag open. Once you do, your presented with 2 vacuum packed bag-o-pillow. Once you take them out though, they inflate to regular size within minutes with no awkward smells. Will definitely buy again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these pillows. Purchased them 4 months ago & they are still nice & fluffy! Great buy. Definitely replacing all my pillows with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great pillows! Soft and comfy. I bought them for my son but I took one over bcuz it’s comparable to my down pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft outside, firmer inside, comfortable pillows "breathe", maintain shape and temperature
reviews.reviewText: Pillows are each shipped in smallest volume attainable: Flattened and tightly compressed pillow in a sealed plastic bag, rolled up. The moment you cut away the plastic bag and air can get in, the pillow immediately swells into a normal, fully puffed-up size and stays that way. No wrinkles, no bends, no deformities, no evidence whatsoever remains that it was ever flattened and rolled up into a tight container for shipping.The pillow slowly squeezes out air when pressed (e.g., by your head when resting on it) and sucks the air back in fully upon removing the pressure from the pillow. Could this "breathing" effect be why the pillows don't get unevenly warm with body heat? The pillows stay lukewarm (they don't get hot) against your body in warmer temperatures. In colder temperatures, the pillow is cool at first but quickly gets to that lukewarm temperature. Therefore, I have not found myself sweating or feeling too cold against this pillow.The pillow is very soft at first when pressed down, and it gets somewhat firmer the deeper into the pillow you press. It allows me to rest my head comfortably, whether lying on my back or on my side. When I raise up away from the pillow, the pillow quickly returns to its full shape. The shape of the pillow conforms to the shape of my head, arms and legs -- my head senses the pillow's comfortable firmness directly underneath, surrounded gently around all sides.This pillow holds the pillowcases on so that they don't slide off or bunch up while sleeping. The pillow itself is much lighter than it looks. No hissing sound, no sound at all as air slowly seeps into or out of the pillow.I bought six pillows blindly (I saw good reviews but was otherwise unfamiliar with what exactly I could expect). I am so very pleased with these pillows. Zero allergic reactions and no odor. Good temperature. I am glad I decided on these and didn't wait any longer to purchase them. I have slept comfortably with these pillows; I enjoy using five pillows at a time all around my body when I am sleeping. No creases, crevices or lumps. I am very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price! Great pillows! Very soft. Not firm so if you are looking for firm, this is not your pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like these pillows because they are soft and fluffy. Unfortunately they are not washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Cat Likes Them Better Than Me
reviews.reviewText: These are incredibly soft, so soft and comfortable that I thought about taking a star away - my cat no longer wants to sleep on me, but against these pillows. Like how dare she. I have lost my cuddle buddy. All day she's on them. And all night...I bought new pillows after a friend informed me that after like 2 years, 10% of your pillow weight is dust mites. So I immediately bought these ones because they were cheap and had good reviews, and I don't need much in a pillow.I like pillows that are very thin to even no pillow. These are pretty thick, but soft enough that it squishes so doesn't feel overly thick. It still is slightly too thick for me though, but a little wear should fix that. If you like super thick and firm pillows like I used to (I went from super thick pillows to no pillow so idk what is up with me anymore), then these pillows are not for you. If you can't sleep with a pillow, these pillows are not for you. But if you want these pillows to cuddle your head and your cat, then buy them. I don't want to do anything besides lay on these pillows anymore.They are longer than a standard pillow (obviously, cuz they're queen pillows and apparently that's a thing), so they properly fit in some of my pillowcases now, but my other set I just doubled up the cases so no pillow was exposed.They do come vacuum packed and then in a zipper bag, so are difficult to get out, but I held on to one of the pillows and swung the bag around violently and they came out. It was quite therapeutic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST Pillow EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I have been struggling for years to find the right pillow. I have tried two pillows, one pillow, and specialty pillows and I usually wake up with a headache. I bought these pillows thinking "What have I got to lose?" From the minute I laid my head on it, I was in love with it. It's soft, cozy, and cool. No headache. I only encountered difficulty getting them out of the bag because they were so compressed. I let them "puff" back up for 24 hours before using them and they are PERFECT for us!
Confortable. Bon achat rapport qualité prix.

Son suavecitas y después de un mes de uso, siguen iguales, he comprado almohadas que con una semana de uso se deforman, pero esta compra fue magnífica. Me encantaron y son muy suaves. Si buscas firmeza, esta no es la almohada para ti.

reviews.reviewerName: Keith Whiteside retired and in contact with friends.
reviews.reviewText: The cool pillow feature advertised is incorrect as cooling not true. After using the pillow for a week I found it did help in preventing neck ache, soft to us but definitely not a cooling pillow.
A good value pillow. I purchased for guest bed.
Son buenas, aunque a mi gusto un poco suaves, pero sí son muy amplias y cómodas.
